ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would recommend this course to anyone with an interest in the Middle East and political science, but probably not to those who had little background in the region or interests in engaging with region-specific debates. This is not a weakness of the course, and speaks to its high level of specialization. The class was intense (high reading load) but extremely rewarding for those who put in the work.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course was instrumental in prospectus/dissertation development, giving me an opportunity to familiarize myself with current debates in the area-studies/political science intersection and view my options. It also deepened by understanding of the issues present in the field of political science for those trying to study the Middle East.
